text: Uttoxeter is a small market town and civil parish in East Staffordshire, Staffordshire, England. In 2001, 12,023 people lived there.http://www.neighbourhood.statistics.gov.uk/dissemination/LeadTableView.do?a=3&b;=799423&c;=Uttoxeter&d;=16&e;=15&g;=484965&i;=1001x1003x1004&m;=0&r;=1&s;=1307800733974&enc;=1&dsFamilyId;=779 This number was expected to grow when new developments in the town finished. Uttoxeter is close to the River Dove. It is near the cities of Stoke-on-Trent, Derby and Lichfield. It is twinned with Raisdorf in Germany (with whom close links are still maintained), and Fumel in France. == References == Category:Towns in Staffordshire Category:Civil parishes in Staffordshire Category:Market towns in England
title: Uttoxeter
